title: Scrum Master - Senior Project
description: Managed and guided a team of six developers to create a Trainer scheduling and workout management web application.
Project was completed within three sprints of two week intervals from design to proof of concept in six weeks.

title: Lead Computer Science Advisor
description: Oversaw all computer science related activities currently taking place within the environment.

title: Inducted Member of The National Society of Leadership and Success
description: Identified and improved goals for group of peers to achieve long term personal success.
